835790.name: Datascape
835790.description:
Third-person casual platformer set within a virtual, endless void known as the Datascape. You are are generic program avatar, broken but not deleted. Journey through the Datascape to discover your function and purpose.

Polarity Change
Switch between two polarities instantly to solve interesting platforming challenges.

Layers of the Datascape
Increasing tough challenges await as you dive deeper into the Datascape. Over 30 Levels await!

UPLINK Signal
Replay each Datascape section to improve your UPLINK signal strength and time!
835790.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
